Interface Product

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public interface Product
extends java.io.Serializable

This interface shows what data a product must contain to work within this system. Implementing this interface allows the product to be easily dropped into the system.

Version:
Summer 2013
Author:
Franklin University

Method Summary

          Return the description of the product.

          Return the ID of the Product.

          Return the name of the product.

          Return the price of the product.
 int getQuantity()
          Return the quantity of the Product remaining in stock.
